divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were having a little fire and talking in our back yard. We both saw out of the corner of ours eyes an object shooting over our neighbors house. It was brite, red first then blue, bigger than a shooting star. We were both speechless.....I was expecting it to like explode with like fireworks or something. It was quick and seemed as though I could have touched it. It almost made same motions as a shooting star, but bigger. It appeared out of no where and we saw it longer than any shooting star I have ever seen. It like moved like a shooting star but kind of dipped down and up the slightest bit. After we were like, what in the world. I felt confused and speechless.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Lenoir
There were no other sightings in Lenoir on or around January 15th 2010
Summary: Not sure what...looked up saw a bright larger than shooting star object red, blue looked brite i thought it was going to explode
